item.name: Amphora Wines
item.address1: Stonyfell Winery, Stonyfell Road, Stonyfell SA 5066
item.description: This is a large-scale negociant business which, in 2001, established its cellar door at the historic Stonyfell Winery and changed its name from Montego Estate Wines to Amphora Wine Group. Winemaker Michael Sawyer has an impressive CV, having worked in wineries such as Tatachilla, Wirra Wirra and Rosemount in Australia, small producers in Washington State and Oregon, before working in the Rhne Valley, south of Chateauneuf-du-Pape. He is responsible for selecting bulk wines, blending them and overseeing their development in oak before being bottled. Exports to Asia and NZ.
